Key Match Events: The Detroit Pistons took care of business and won the game 118-115 against the Portland Trail Blazers.
Pre-Game Insights: Many expected the Pistons to be better, but they just might be more competitive than they were getting credit for earlier in the season.
Post-Match Reflections: Cade Cunningham told reporters on Monday night after the win over Portland, 'I appreciate it a lot. It's taken a lot of work from everybody. So, to be at this point right now, it feels good. A lot of games left, but this is a huge moment for us. I think it's only something we can build on.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons advanced to 18-18 on the season and snagged their fourth win in a row.
For the first time since 2018, the Pistons are.500 in January.
The Pistons are tied with the Atlanta Hawks, who donâ€™t have the advantage in a tie-breaker currently.
Others: Cade Cunningham is in the All-Star conversation as an early top-ten vote-getter.
Jaden Ivey was having a career-high season in scoring and efficiency before going down with an injury.
Malik Beasley has been one of the sharpest high-volume shooters in the NBA.
